DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate use prophylactic tissue sealant prevent epithelial ingrowth gain access LASIK flap repeat LASIK surgery
DOC.brief_title: Tissue Sealant Use LASIK Enhancement Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Participants comprehensive eye examination express interest study . This include slit lamp examination front eye dilate fundoscopic examination back eye . If pathology note would exclude participant study , participant inform give appropriate referral . If participant deem appropriate study comprehensive examination include computerized videokeratography , enrol . The participant undergo LASIK flap lift eye surgery . Tissue sealant apply edge LASIK flap conclusion surgery . A bandage contact lens also place . The bandage contact lens use usual customary fashion non-study LASIK flap lift surgery . The participant see day surgery , post op day one , one month , three month . The participant receive topical antibiotic eye one week follow procedure . The participant receive pred forte 1 % ophthalmic drop one week treatment . The participant also receive vigamox ophthalmic drop seven day treatment . All within usual customary standard care treatment participant undergo LASIK surgery .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 21 old Subjects healthy eye Subjects previously undergone LASIK surgery Subjects residual refractive error . Subjects age 21 . Subjects excessively thin cornea . Subjects topographic evidence keratoconus . Subjects ectatic eye disorder . Subjects autoimmune disease . Subjects pregnant nursing .
